info.welcome: Hello! This is a very funky contrib pack.
info.shrine-danger: Warning: Dangerous object ahead, may kill!
info.smbref-goaway: There is no Easter Bunny, there is no Tooth Fairy and there is no Warp Zone.
info.blizzard: A dangerous blizzard is in effect. Don't be in the cold for too long and try to shelter yourself. (You take damage every 3 seconds.)

level.comingsoonog: Coming as soon as Half Life 3
level.comingsoon: Coming soon - also tux is drowninghwsbhcjabbvfciou
level.sn-l4a: Sliding Around at the Speed of Sound

npc.nsam-0: My friend. Have you heard of the cybergrind? It's a mystic place found within the forest somewhere, according to legends.
npc.nsam-1: No friend, I can't give you credit. Come back when you're a little mmmmm richer.
npc.nsam-3: You want it? It's yours my friend as long as you have enough gold.
npc.nsam-4: Nolok? My friend, he cannot come here due to the Important Plot ShieldTM
npc.nsam-5: One time, a programmer came over asking if I had any 'Programmer Socks' on sale. Unfortunately, I only have firepower and some bombs. But perhaps, if they had some rubies...
npc.konqi-unlock: Hey, thanks for getting me out of here! That stupid Yeti threw me into this cell.
npc.penny-tux: Hey tux, where did you put my Thinkpad?
npc.penny-konqi: Konqi, stop setting nano to be an alias for vim on Katie's laptop. She doesn't know how to exit it.
npc.penny-midi: I'd make a joke about Midi, but I don't have any notes for him.
npc.penny-katie: *psst*, Don't tell Konqi but I made all of their games an alias for the best twitch streamer (KelvinShadewing).
